Topic.Title: Changing wording of 'You can't go that way' ?

Posts.HTML:
[Resolved} I searched my game code and found two instances of <UnresolvedLocation> "You can't go that way."</UnresolvedLocation>

Not sure why there are two, but that was the problem.

I want to change the wording of non-exits from "You can't go that way." to "There's nothing of interest or value in that direction."

I'm using the updated English library which changes all possessive nouns from 'You' to 'He', so am not sure where this 'You..' is coming from.

Anyway, I searched the Library Elements and found <UnresolvedLocation> was using "He can't go that way." so I changed it to my desired response and saved.

However, a non-exit still gets "You can't go that way."

Any idea what I'm doing wrong?
